A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It doesn't take much at all for me to enjoy an action movie in space. I'm pretty easy. Space ships\, sword fights\, good\, evil\, heroism\, drama - sign me up. It doesn't have to be great- I'm usually down with the cause. I like a lot of bad movies as long as they do a decent job of taking me on a journey for an hour or so. 

I'm not a Star Wars "fanboy"and am totally cool with a movie taking an old narrative into a new direction with new/diverse characters. However this movie is nonsensical in so many ways that it is very hard to suspend disbelief and get lost in the movie. 
The humor is misplaced\, the characters' motives are either unclear or inconsistent\, and the plot holes are as vast as outer space. 

I'm all about change-but not just for the sake of change itself. There has to be a payoff. Honestly\, I just couldn't wait for it to be over because I felt so uncomfortable watching it. It's like watching a comic bomb. You are just stuck watching something happen that your brain is rejecting\, but you stick with it because you hope and pray that there will eventually be something redeemable in return for the money and time you've invested. 

It never happened for me. I hope you enjoyed it better than I did. 

This is the first review of a movie I have ever submitted. I felt compelled (maybe too strong of a word) to write this because I don't understand how most of the critics are into this. It's very strange. I'm almost always in agreement with the majority of critics. Its just weird. I'm also hanging with my in-laws for the holiday season and don't have much to do on this snowy day. 

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year everyone!!! May the force be with you - as well as your family and loved ones! Dec 23\,2017
